title: Act I Cloudless Day
author: WardZhou
content:
Andante

It was like a dance in the train
Bumpy but it had a lead
Crushed on the grass
Gazing at the changing clouds
The sun was sheltered then revealed
I went back to the cabin
Slept with a dream wondering
If it would be a cloudless day ahead
